thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Why Intelligence Pros Have Swung Behind the CIA’s Gina Haspel

author: Gerald F. Seib
title: Why Intelligence Pros Have Swung Behind the CIA’s Gina Haspel
text:
Is she the consummate intelligence professional who is supported by six former heads of the Central Intelligence Agency and who once befriended Mother Teresa, among other achievements in a career with a James Bond-like arc?
Or is she a reminder of what a Democratic senator calls “one of the darkest episodes in the CIA’s history,” tied to a period of brutal interrogation of terrorism suspects that almost no one wants to see repeated?
...
